Author: lizsisi
Text: Idk if you’re male or female, but honestly I think a lot of men especially do not have a good grasp on how weight really works... I’ve had boyfriends literally assume I weigh 20 pounds more than I do even at my heaviest just bc they just do not understand how weight looks different on different heights.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: <3 It’s impossible to know what he was thinking really. It really could have been neutral (Oh, free range eggs cost $5? Huh. Didn’t know that.) I wish he’d have suppressed that reaction though!   I mean, I’m kinda fixated on weight an BMI, I *still* really only know the numbers for someone close to my height. And most people are even more clueless than that. The average male is gonna have zero clue what the weight ranges are gonna be (or look like) for a female of a significantly different height. Zero. Clue. I promise. <3
